test_beselI.f90

00001 ! ---------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Program to calculate the first kind modified Bessel function
00003 ! of integer order N, for any REAL X, using the function BESSI(N,X).
00004 ! ---------------------------------------------------------------------
00005 ! SAMPLE RUN:
00006 !
00007 ! (Calculate Bessel function for N=2, X=0.75).
00008 ! 
00009 ! Bessel function of order  2 for X =  0.7500:
00010 !
00011 !      Y =  0.73666878E-01
00012 !
00013 ! ---------------------------------------------------------------------
00014 ! Reference: From Numath Library By Tuan Dang Trong in Fortran 77
00015 !            [BIBLI 18]. 
00016 !
00017 !                               F90 Release 1.0 By J-P Moreau, Paris
00018 ! ---------------------------------------------------------------------
00019 PROGRAM TBESSI
00020 
00021   REAL*8  BESSI, y
00022   real*8 :: x
00023   INTEGER N
00024 
00025   N=0
00026   X=450.1D0
00027 
00028   Y = BESSI(N,X)
00029 
00030   write(*,10) N, X
00031   write(*,20) Y
00032 
00033   stop
00034 
00035 10 format (/' Bessel Function of order ',I2,' for X=',F8.4,':')
00036 20 format(/'      Y = ',E15.8/)
00037 
00038 END
00039 
00040 ! ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00041       FUNCTION BESSI(N,X)
00042 !
00043 !     This subroutine calculates the first kind modified Bessel function
00044 !     of integer order N, for any REAL X. We use here the classical
00045 !     recursion formula, when X > N. For X < N, the Miller's algorithm
00046 !     is used to avoid overflows. 
00047 !     REFERENCE:
00048 !     C.W.CLENSHAW, CHEBYSHEV SERIES FOR MATHEMATICAL FUNCTIONS,
00049 !     MATHEMATICAL TABLES, VOL.5, 1962.
00050 !
00051       PARAMETER (IACC = 40,BIGNO = 1.D10, BIGNI = 1.D-10)
00052       REAL *8 X,BESSI,BESSI0,BESSI1,TOX,BIM,BI,BIP
00053       IF (N.EQ.0) THEN
00054       BESSI = BESSI0(X)
00055       RETURN
00056       ENDIF
00057       IF (N.EQ.1) THEN
00058       BESSI = BESSI1(X)
00059       RETURN
00060       ENDIF
00061       IF(X.EQ.0.D0) THEN
00062       BESSI=0.D0
00063       RETURN
00064       ENDIF
00065       TOX = 2.D0/X
00066       BIP = 0.D0
00067       BI  = 1.D0
00068       BESSI = 0.D0
00069       M = 2*((N+INT(SQRT(FLOAT(IACC*N)))))
00070       DO 12 J = M,1,-1
00071       BIM = BIP+DFLOAT(J)*TOX*BI
00072       BIP = BI
00073       BI  = BIM
00074       IF (ABS(BI).GT.BIGNO) THEN
00075       BI  = BI*BIGNI
00076       BIP = BIP*BIGNI
00077       BESSI = BESSI*BIGNI
00078       ENDIF
00079       IF (J.EQ.N) BESSI = BIP
00080    12 CONTINUE
00081       BESSI = BESSI*BESSI0(X)/BI
00082       RETURN
00083       END
00084 ! ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00085 ! Auxiliary Bessel functions for N=0, N=1
00086       FUNCTION BESSI0(X)
00087       REAL *8 X,BESSI0,Y,P1,P2,P3,P4,P5,P6,P7,  
00088       Q1,Q2,Q3,Q4,Q5,Q6,Q7,Q8,Q9,AX,BX
00089       DATA P1,P2,P3,P4,P5,P6,P7/1.D0,3.5156229D0,3.0899424D0,1.2067429D0,  &
00090       0.2659732D0,0.360768D-1,0.45813D-2/
00091       DATA Q1,Q2,Q3,Q4,Q5,Q6,Q7,Q8,Q9/0.39894228D0,0.1328592D-1, &
00092       0.225319D-2,-0.157565D-2,0.916281D-2,-0.2057706D-1,  &
00093       0.2635537D-1,-0.1647633D-1,0.392377D-2/
00094       IF(ABS(X).LT.3.75D0) THEN
00095       Y=(X/3.75D0)**2
00096       BESSI0=P1+Y*(P2+Y*(P3+Y*(P4+Y*(P5+Y*(P6+Y*P7)))))
00097       ELSE
00098       AX=ABS(X)
00099       Y=3.75D0/AX
00100       BX=EXP(AX)/SQRT(AX)
00101       AX=Q1+Y*(Q2+Y*(Q3+Y*(Q4+Y*(Q5+Y*(Q6+Y*(Q7+Y*(Q8+Y*Q9)))))))
00102       BESSI0=AX*BX
00103       ENDIF
00104       RETURN
00105       END
00106 ! ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00107       FUNCTION BESSI1(X)
00108       REAL *8 X,BESSI1,Y,P1,P2,P3,P4,P5,P6,P7,  
00109       Q1,Q2,Q3,Q4,Q5,Q6,Q7,Q8,Q9,AX,BX
00110       DATA P1,P2,P3,P4,P5,P6,P7/0.5D0,0.87890594D0,0.51498869D0,  &
00111       0.15084934D0,0.2658733D-1,0.301532D-2,0.32411D-3/
00112       DATA Q1,Q2,Q3,Q4,Q5,Q6,Q7,Q8,Q9/0.39894228D0,-0.3988024D-1, &
00113       -0.362018D-2,0.163801D-2,-0.1031555D-1,0.2282967D-1, &
00114       -0.2895312D-1,0.1787654D-1,-0.420059D-2/
00115       IF(ABS(X).LT.3.75D0) THEN
00116       Y=(X/3.75D0)**2
00117       BESSI1=X*(P1+Y*(P2+Y*(P3+Y*(P4+Y*(P5+Y*(P6+Y*P7))))))
00118       ELSE
00119       AX=ABS(X)
00120       Y=3.75D0/AX
00121       BX=EXP(AX)/SQRT(AX)
00122       AX=Q1+Y*(Q2+Y*(Q3+Y*(Q4+Y*(Q5+Y*(Q6+Y*(Q7+Y*(Q8+Y*Q9)))))))
00123       BESSI1=AX*BX
00124       ENDIF
00125       RETURN
00126       END
00127 ! ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00128 
00129 ! end of file tbessi.f90
